title: Unable to get a valid rectangle using getObject().pickRectangle ()

code_blocks.author: dale

code_blocks.code:
#! python 3
import Rhino

go = Rhino.Input.Custom.GetObject()
go.SetCommandPrompt("Window select an object")
go.Get()
if go.CommandResult() == Rhino.Commands.Result.Success:
    rect = go.PickRectangle()
    print(rect)
